thread.title: Finra Would Allow Brokers to Block Trades to Protect Seniors
thread.title_full: Finra Would Allow Brokers to Block Trades to Protect Seniors - WSJ

author: Anna Prior
title: Finra Would Allow Brokers to Block Trades to Protect Seniors
text:
Financial firms that believe an older client is being taken advantage of would be allowed to temporarily block requested disbursements of cash or securities from an account, under a proposal approved Thursday by the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority’s board.
Finra, Wall Street’s self-regulator, has been taking a close look at issues involving seniors and other vulnerable adults. Earlier this year it set up a hotline to assist...
